CHANGELOGÔÉÅ

24.11.26 : Add mashup dialog file saving dialog. Change conf file to add size of insert in pix in the zoom window.

24.11.25 : Start adding mashup from cluster

24.11.20 : Fill up the cluster window with images

24.11.18 : Add the possibility to load a new configuration from the main window.

24.11.16 : pylint as github workflow. This is triggered only of the code is modified. It will pass if the pylint score is higher than 9 and fail if it is below. Pylint 3.0.3 is used and uses a local pylintrc file.
